conclusion: Determine the power of the electromagnetic railgun when the projectile is launched.
Calculate the force on the projectile using the Lorentz force formula: F = B I d = 0.2 N.
Calculate the acceleration of the projectile using Newton's second law: a = F/m = 10 m/s².
Calculate the final velocity of the projectile using the kinematic equation: v = sqrt(10) ≈ 3.16 m/s.
Calculate the power of the railgun using the formula: P = Fv ≈ 0.632 W.
The power of the electromagnetic railgun when the projectile is launched is approximately 0.632 W.
